name: Harvest Moon: Light of Hope Special Edition
description: In celebration of Harvest Moon's 20th Anniversary comes an all new Harvest Moon title for Steam! Harvest Moon: Light of Hope Special Edition! The game encompasses twenty years of the spirit that have made the franchise what it is today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i3 3rd-Generation 2.9GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
